channel.title: TFS 2010 API By Example: Introduction
channel.description: As I am exploring programming against TFS 2010, I usually build myself up a collection of code snippets that show me how to do various discrete operations. I thought it would be useful for me to post some of these...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Mango+00:00
item.description: can we use delegate authentication when we use the api in a web application in TFS2010?
item.dc:creator: Mango

item.title: Comment by Peter+00:00
item.description: Your last sentence is a cliffhanger -- looking very much forward to a post on how to dell if a server you want to talk to is in the new or old style!
item.dc:creator: Peter

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
